abstract: Amazon reports second-quarter profit of $92 million, or 19 cents a share, compared with loss of 27 cents a share in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 20 percent to $23.2 billion; shares rise 17 percent in after-hours trading; large contributor to profit is cloud computing division Amazon Web Services.
lead_paragraph: A reason for the company’s success has been its cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, which generated $1.82 billion in revenue last quarter.

headline.main: Amazon Reports Unexpected Profit, and Stock Soars
headline.print_headline: The Leader of E-Commerce Shows a Profit for a Change

snippet: A reason for the company’s success has been its cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, which generated $1.82 billion in revenue last quarter.
